data.name: Fighting! Ms. Luan!! ─ Gold-digging Angelic Bitch Simulation
data.detailed_description:
Our Pure love Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1985620/_/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2018440/_/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1948470/_/


Other Premium Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1624020/_/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/811070/__Conviction/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1745260/Girls_Cairo_Papyrus/


About the Game

Incapable of a loser to make a choice, I want all the money and men!

A domineering president, a gentle neighbor brother, or a handsome star, all of them are in my pocket!

The heroine Luan is a typical angelic bitch. In pursuit of profit, she is doing everything she can, her pretty face and body are her tools.

She is very good at using her innocent face and her delicate voice to cheat.

In the face of the excellent prey that she has painstakingly lured in-the high and mighty elite, the gentle and elegant bamboo horse, and the warm and sunny idol - the cool-headed Luan carefully weaves different beautiful dreams to make the prey fall into her own net.

If it succeeds, it will be a success for all.

And if it fails to trigger the suspicion of these men, then it will become the pages of social headlines ......
Luan's happiness is in your hands!
Fighting! Ms. Luan!!

Game Content
20 basic CGs with more than 60 differentials
Humorous and funny plot
Easy and stress-free simulation
Exquisite and versatile drawing shape
100,000 words of content
Multiple endings to explore
Come experience the fun of being a bitch!

data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel I5/I7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
